constituent: delicate, sherpa, Nelson, column, going, line, mountain, one, ceiling, human legs, taskmaster
heisigStory: Line . . . mountain . . . ceiling . . . human legs . . . taskmaster.
koohiiStory1: The Column of 300 spartans were in a delicate situation. They had travelled in one line (using only their legs) to the mountain pass to face the fierce Persian task master.
koohiiStory2: Telling your taskmistress (wife) why you are going mountain climbing without her is a delicate situation... "For one thing you have such beautiful legs and I don´t want to risk injuring them honey"...　　　　　　RTK2:　ビ　微笑　びしょう(smile)　"delicate laugh".
myStory: vi. nhỏ, ẩn, dấu, màu nhiệm. đi bộ truy theo ngọn núi đến đỉnh.
words: faint, dim, weak, indistinct, hazy, poor, wretched
